p: In addition to the low frequency of paediatric CoVID-19 cases, it must also be noted that the majority of them were clinically mild (70%, 19/27), and SARS-CoV-2 detection was possible because of the proactive search in contacts of more evident CoVID-19 presentations. At the time of writing, none of the paediatric patients with confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection diagnosed in our laboratory required Intensive Care Unit (ICU) medical admission.
